name: part_012
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE3【チラ見せ】 [3OkprzHcirU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Iroha Ni Hoheto Ayafubumi performing a high-energy song medley on stage.
MC section where the unit members introduce themselves to the audience.

subtitles.original: 命は短し　我武者羅に刻め
subtitles.english: Life is short, carve it recklessly

subtitles.original: 一富士二鷹三は鬼
subtitles.english: One Fuji, two hawks, three is Oni

subtitles.original: 千客万来　おいでませ
subtitles.english: A constant stream of guests, please come in

subtitles.original: あっぱれ　お祭りじゃ
subtitles.english: Splendid! It's a festival!

subtitles.original: 打ちまくれ
subtitles.english: Drum away!

subtitles.original: 謳え宴　宴は続く　舞え　アニマルダンス
subtitles.english: Sing the banquet, the banquet continues, dance, animal dance

subtitles.original: 言いたいことがあるんだよ！
subtitles.english: There's something I want to say!

subtitles.original: やっぱりケモ耳かわいいよ！
subtitles.english: As expected, animal ears are cute!

subtitles.original: コンコン、ゴー！　メチャカッコ！
subtitles.english: Kon Kon, Go! Super cool!

subtitles.original: やっと見つけたお嬢様！
subtitles.english: Finally found the young lady!

subtitles.original: 僕等と未来へ繋いで行こう！
subtitles.english: Let's connect to the future with us!

subtitles.original: 夢を追いかけ　何処までも
subtitles.english: Chasing dreams, no matter where

subtitles.original: 世界で一番愛してる！
subtitles.english: I love you the most in the world!

subtitles.original: あ・い・し・て・るー！
subtitles.english: I-l-o-v-e-y-o-u-!

subtitles.original: 踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's dance

subtitles.original: 鬼と負けじと舞い踊れ　小生意気な狐も飛び回れ
subtitles.english: Dance like an Oni without losing, the cheeky fox also flies around

subtitles.original: 命は短し　我武者羅に刻め
subtitles.english: Life is short, carve it recklessly

subtitles.original: 一富士二鷹三は鬼
subtitles.english: One Fuji, two hawks, three is Oni

subtitles.original: 千客万来　おいでませ
subtitles.english: A constant stream of guests, please come in

subtitles.original: あっぱれ　お祭りじゃ
subtitles.english: Splendid! It's a festival!

subtitles.original: 打ちまくれ
subtitles.english: Drum away!

subtitles.original: 謳え宴　宴は続く　舞え　アニマルダンス
subtitles.english: Sing the banquet, the banquet continues, dance, animal dance

subtitles.original: 色づく想いは刹那　百花繚乱　花吹雪
subtitles.english: Colorful thoughts are momentary, blooming in profusion, a blizzard of flowers

subtitles.original: 2階席も行きますよー！　みんな　声出せー！
subtitles.english: We're going to the 2nd floor seats too! Everyone, raise your voices!

subtitles.original: パッと咲いて散った花は　終焉を告げてく
subtitles.english: The flowers that bloomed and scattered quickly signal the end

subtitles.original: その時を待てど暮らせど　言葉　紡がず
subtitles.english: Waiting for that time day in and day out, words remain unspun

subtitles.original: そっと触れて知った胸の内　温かさを
subtitles.english: The warmth I felt in my heart when I touched it softly

subtitles.original: 初めてのこの気持ちだけ　抱きしめていた
subtitles.english: Just this first-time feeling, I was holding it tight

subtitles.original: 暁　交わした約束は　本物だってきっと
subtitles.english: The promise we made at dawn is surely real

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと　花に魅せられた少女達
subtitles.english: Iroha ni hoheto, girls charmed by flowers

subtitles.original: あぁ　はらりはらりはらり　落ちる花吹雪　踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, harari harari harari, the falling blizzard of flowers, dance

subtitles.original: うたかたであれど　想い　言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Though it's fleeting, I tried putting my thoughts into words

subtitles.original: 誰も皆　焦がれる　現世の理よ
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for it, the logic of this world

subtitles.original: 色づく想いは刹那　百花繚乱　花吹雪
subtitles.english: Colorful thoughts are momentary, blooming in profusion, a blizzard of flowers

subtitles.original: ひぃふぅみぃ数えて　ひぃふぅみぃ数えて
subtitles.english: Counting one, two, three... counting one, two, three...

subtitles.original: ここへおいで　ここへおいで
subtitles.english: Come over here... come over here...

subtitles.original: 暁　交わした約束は　本物だってきっと
subtitles.english: The promise we made at dawn is surely real

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと　花に魅せられた少女達
subtitles.english: Iroha ni hoheto, girls charmed by flowers

subtitles.original: あぁ　はらりはらりはらり　落ちる花吹雪　踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, harari harari harari, the falling blizzard of flowers, dance

subtitles.original: うたかたであれど　想い　言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Though it's fleeting, I tried putting my thoughts into words

subtitles.original: 誰も皆　焦がれる　現世の理よ
subtitles.english: Everyone yearns for it, the logic of this world

subtitles.original: 色づく想いは刹那　百花繚乱　花吹雪
subtitles.english: Colorful thoughts are momentary, blooming in profusion, a blizzard of flowers

subtitles.original: 風に舞う　乙女の純情　咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: A maiden's pure heart dancing in the wind, bloom in full pride

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 自由自由！
subtitles.english: Free, free!

subtitles.original: ストップストップ！配信の所、所！
subtitles.english: Stop, stop! The stream section, section!

subtitles.original: ご挨拶、ご挨拶。はい、まずはあやめから、はいどうぞ！
subtitles.english: Greetings, greetings. Okay, first from Ayame, go ahead!

subtitles.original: はい！みんな、いろはにほへと　あやふぶみの　あや担当、百鬼あやめだぞー！
subtitles.english: Yes! Everyone, I'm Nakiri Ayame, the "Aya" in charge of Iroha Ni Hoheto Ayafubumi!

subtitles.original: そしてー！
subtitles.english: And!

subtitles.original: はい！いろはにほへと　あやふぶみの　ふぶ担当、白上フブキです！
subtitles.english: Yes! I'm Shirakami Fubuki, the "Fubu" in charge of Iroha Ni Hoheto Ayafubumi!

subtitles.original: そしてそしてー！
subtitles.english: And and!

subtitles.original: はい！いろはにほへと　あやふぶみの　み担当、大神ミオです！
subtitles.english: Yes! I'm Ookami Mio, the "Mi" in charge of Iroha Ni Hoheto Ayafubumi!

subtitles.original: そして、3人揃って...
subtitles.english: And, all three of us together...

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと　あやふぶみでーす！
subtitles.english: We are Iroha Ni Hoheto Ayafubumi!

subtitles.original: ちょっとちょっと、なんかあや...
subtitles.english: Wait wait, something about Aya...
